forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
